title: engum nirainda poruLE
sahitya:
engum nirainda poruLE paramAtmanE ellArkkum inbam aruLE


anupallavi

  pongum uyirkkuyirAit-tangum saccidAnanda bOdha svarUpanE vEda hrdayanE


caraNam    jnAlamellAm un shakti nATaka sAlai nAnAvinai ellAm un jnAmrta lIlai
kAlattilE Ur kOlam varum unadu kATSiyaik-kalai sheyyak-karuNai purivAyE
